oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.input

Class SpatialFilterInputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.input.CompositeInputFormat<K,V>
        • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.input.SpatialFilterInputFormat<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the record's key. The same type used by the internal InputFormat.
    V - The type of the record's value. The same type used by the internal InputFormat.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractCompositeInputFormat<K,V>

    public class SpatialFilterInputFormat<K,V>
extends CompositeInputFormat<K,V>
    Input format used to filter information read through an internal input format. The information is filtered based on a spatial operation which at least should contain the query window (the geometry to compare against) and a binary spatial operation (isInside, anyInteract). A spatial index can be specified to speed up the filtering. If no spatial index is specified, an implementation of RecordInfoProvider should be set.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

      • getDelegateRecordReader

        public <any> getDelegateRecordReader(FileSplit split,
                                     JobConf conf,
                                     Reporter reporter)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: CompositeInputFormat
        Creates a record reader instance. The returned record instance can be a wrapper of the internalInputFormat's record reader. This method is called after getRecordReader(). If the internalInputFormat is a CombineFileInputFormat subclass, this method can be called as many times as paths are contained in the CombineFileSplits.
        Specified by:
        getDelegateRecordReader in class CompositeInputFormat<K,V>
        Parameters:
        split - a FileSplit instance
        conf - the job configuration
        reporter - a Reporter instance
        Returns:
        a RecordReader instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setSpatialIndexName

        public static void setSpatialIndexName(JobConf conf,
                                       java.lang.String spatialIndexName)
        Sets the name of the spatial index. It is used to search the index in the distributed cache.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        spatialIndexName - the name of the spatial index

      • setSpatialIndexPath

        public static void setSpatialIndexPath(JobConf conf,
                                       Path spatialIndexPath,
                                       boolean addToDistCache)
        Sets the path of the spatial index
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        spatialIndexPath - the path where the spatial index can be found
        addToDistCache - whether the spatial index should be placed in the distributed cache
